	<item>
		<title>Class Descriptions</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/class-descriptions/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 22 Jan 2012 23:56:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>jonathan</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://107.20.220.20/wordpress/?page_id=820</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a name="top"></a>
Download<a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/pub?key=0AhfikJpJj0uVdGtmNnpjQV9Gb05rN2k5Z01LY1dFcnc&amp;single=true&amp;gid=0&amp;output=html">Spring/Summer Schedule</a>

<a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/#schedule" target="_blank">Visit our LIVE Schedule</a>
<p style="text-align: left;"><span style="text-align: right;">Looking for tap &amp; Irish classes? Visit our neighbors <a title="Boston Percussive Dance" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/boston-percussive-dance/" target="_blank">Boston Percussive Dance</a></span></p>


[caption id="attachment_890" align="alignright" width="300" caption="Photo by Liza Voll Photography"]<img class="size-medium wp-image-890 " title="LizaVollPhotography-1870" src="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/LizaVollPhotography-1870-300x199.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="199" />[/caption]

&nbsp;

<a title="Teachers &amp; Artists in Residence" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=174" target="_blank">Teacher Bios click here.</a>

&nbsp;

<a href="#modern"><strong>MODERN</strong></a>

<a href="#ballet"><strong>BALLET</strong></a>

<a href="#improv"><strong>MOVEMENT TRAINING &amp; IMPROVISATION</strong></a>

<a href="#jazz"><strong>JAZZ &amp; HIP HOP</strong></a>

<a href="#childrens"><strong>CHILDRENS DANCE</strong></a>

<a href="#latin"><strong>LATIN DANCE</strong></a>

<a href="#traditional"><strong>TRADITIONAL DANCE/ECLECTIC</strong></a>

Balkan Dance

Middle Eastern/BellyDance

Bollywood

Hawaiian

<a href="#tap"><strong>TAP, IRISH DANCE, FLAMENCO</strong></a>

<strong>
</strong>

<strong></strong>

<strong>**For Schedule Changes andCancellations, please visit our <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/#livesched" target="_blank">(LIVE SCHEDULE)</a></strong>, dates below may not reflect changes.**
<a id="modern" name="modern"></a><a id="advbegmod" name="advbegmod"></a>

&nbsp;

<strong></strong>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>MODERN</strong></span>

&nbsp;

<strong>Advanced Beginning Modern <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#jody" target="_blank">(Jody Weber)</a></strong>

This class is for adult dancers with some experience and a basic understanding of dance vocabulary. Its a great place to start if you are coming back to dance. The class explores a full understanding of the spine, expanded vocabulary, alignment, and musicality through full bodied phrases. Friendly atmosphere!

Mondays 7:30-9:00pm July 9th-Aug 13th

$100 pre-register or $17 for drop-ins - Drop-ins $17
<a id="contemp" name="contemp"></a>
Registration available at: http://www.weberdance.com/<wbr>classes-and-workshops.html</wbr>

&nbsp;

<strong> Open Level Contemporary <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#chien" target="_blank">(Chien Hwe)</a></strong>
Mondays 5:45-7:15pm
$15 drop in, $120 pre-registration for the entire summer. (pre-registration required by June 30th)

1,000 Virtues Contemporary Dance SUMMER SERIES

TECHNIQUE - ballet, horton, yoga, choreography. Build strength and coordination to your core, breath through movement. $15 for drop-in, $60 for July Series

AUGUST (4 weeks) - IMPROV - meditation, visualization, improvisation, partnering and choreography. Build trust and fluidity with your own body. $15 for drop-in, $45 for August Series.

Pre-register for July, August or ENTIRE summer series by emailing chienhwe@gmail.com before June 30th. <span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>If you pay for the entire Summer Series on or before June 30th, the price is $100.</strong></span> Non-refundable payment of half required on or before the first day of the series. A minimum of 6 people are required for this class to continue. <a href="http://www.1000virtues.com">www.1000virtues.com</a>

<a id="modrebecca" name="modrebecca"></a>

<strong>Intermediate/Advanced Modern <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#rebecca" target="_blank">(Rebecca Rice)</a></strong>

Classes focus on developing technical, theatrical performers and build strong, musical and organic movers. Influences range from Bill Evans/ Limon-based modern, Gerri Houlihan, Laban Effort Shape &amp; various Pilates and Evans-based floor work. Included will be Modern floor barre, standing center barre, full, contemporary movement &amp; new choreographic ideas. Attention to working with challenging rhythms in order to build strong musicality will be stressed as well as attention to movement that builds virtuosity of technique and creative self-expression. To register or for info email <a href="mailto:riceflan@gmail.com" target="_blank">riceflan@gmail.com</a>.
<a id="intmodjody" name="intmodjody"></a>
Tuesdays 5:45-7:15pm - June 5- July 10 - Drop-ins $18

&nbsp;

<strong>Intermediate Modern Technique <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#jody" target="_blank">(Jody Weber)</a></strong>

Intermediate modern is a challenging class for dancers with experience. The class focuses on a deep understanding of the body and incorporates ideas from Limon, Cunningham and Graham techniques. Dancers will move through a warm-up that builds strength and clarifies alignment followed by extended phrases which are rhythmically and physically challenging. The class also focuses on performance quality, focus and presence. Generous atmosphere and live music.

Wednesdays - $100 Pre-registration - Drop-ins $17 <strong> ** Substitute Cheri Opperman until Aug 9th** (see below)</strong>

Registration available at: <a href="http://www.weberdance.com/classes-and-workshops.html" target="_blank">http://www.weberdance.com/<wbr>classes-and-workshops.html</wbr></a>

*WD Community Performance Project 7:30-8:30  Pre-Registration Required <strong>**Resumes in Aug**</strong>

This is an open process to learn original choreography performed throughout the year. All participants must register for technique class, but there is no additional cost for the performance group. Interested<a id="intromod" name="intromod"></a> students should email Jody at <a href="mailto:weberdance@rcn.com" target="_blank">weberdance@rcn.com</a>

***Special Summer Classes***

<strong>Intermediate/Advanced Modern Technique with Cheri Opperman</strong>

Wednesday 6-7:30pm studio 1 -- Beginning June 6th - Aug 1st
Live musical accompaniment provided by Jerr Bussiere
Single class/drop in $17 --- Email Cheri Opperman for more info at cheriop@ren.com

&nbsp;

<strong>Intro to Modern <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#sarahm" target="_blank">(Sarah Mae Gibbons)</a></strong>

Intro to modern dance is a class that looks at modern dance through the methods of technique, improvisation and composition. Each class includes warm-up, floor work and across the floor sequences. In this way we will explore weight, suspension, release, strength, flexibility and creativity. Exercises and combinations encourage comfort and understanding of personal movement vocabulary.

No prior experience necessary. Email: <a href="mailto:smgibbons.72@gmail.com" target="_blank">smgibbons.72@gmail.com</a> for information
<a id="modnicole" name="modnicole"></a>
Thursdays 6:30-7:30 -<strong> Classes to resume in Aug</strong> - $12 drop-in

&nbsp;

<strong>Intermediate/Advanced Modern <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#nicole" target="_blank">(Nicole Pierce)</a></strong>

This is a fast-moving class for experienced dancers. We will explore technical problems through a mix of classical &amp; idiosyncratic movement vocabularies. Pierce is known for long phrases of challenging, inventive, textural movement, as well as keen musicality and rhythm. While she enjoys pushing technique and mental acuity, she nurtures an atmosphere of levity and acceptance in order to encourage creative interpretation and the development of one's own voice. Warm-up is thorough and relevant to the class work. Live guitar, voice &amp; drums by Jerry Bussiere Pierce and accompanist Jerry Bussiere have worked together for over 15 years and enjoy working in unusual rhythms at many tempos. Never the same class twice! Lots of new material every week.
<a id="luminarium" name="luminarium"></a>
Thursdays 5:45-7:15pm  Ongoing - $17/drop-ins

&nbsp;

<strong>Luminarium Open Class</strong> <strong><a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#merli" target="_blank">(Merli V. Guerra &amp; Kimberleigh Holman)</a></strong>

Designed for experienced dancers at the intermediate/advanced level, Luminarium's Open Company Class provides a welcoming, yet challenging atmosphere for local students and performers. Come dance alongside Luminarium Company Members while learning the two unique styles of Artistic Directors Merli V. Guerra and Kimberleigh A. Holman in a fun environment. There are 12 classes in the Spring Session, alternating bi-weekly between Guerra's contemporary movement with a hint of Classical Indian influence, and Holman's "whimsically physical" modern technique. If you're looking to diversify your technique, keep your brain and body active, or simply learn more about the company, join us for this elastically-charged class.Questions? Email<a href="mailto:info@luminariumdance.org" target="_blank">info@luminariumdance.org</a>

Price: $10 drop in, $85/10-class card
<a id="modmarcus" name="modmarcus"></a>
7:30pm-8:45pm New Session begins July 12

&nbsp;

<strong>** see alternate summer schedule** Intermediate/Advanced Modern <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#marcus" target="_blank">(Marcus Schulkind)</a></strong>

Using the concepts of contract/release, drop/flow, weightedness, and aerial precision, this class consists of floorwork, center work, a barre, and combinations that use the founding principles of modern dance and evolve them to the present. Live music!

Fridays 9:30-11:30am  Ongoing - $17.50/drop-in

&nbsp;

<strong>Moving Target Series (<a href="http://movingtargetboston.wordpress.com/" target="_blank">Various Guest Teachers</a>)</strong>

All moving target classes integrate improvisation with technique(s) rooted in pomo/release technique, somatic forms, martial arts, more. Class series is curated by Lauren Simpson and Annie Kloppenberg. We bring fabulous OOT (out-of-town) teachers and EQUALLY FABULOUS in-town teachers. MT is also about developing community around physical inquiry as a shared experience with class givers and class takers. Please feel free to contact us with questions.<a href="http://movingtargetboston.wordpress.com/" target="_blank">http://movingtargetboston.wordpress.com/</a>

Saturdays 2:00 - 4:00pm  Ongoing - 5 class card or drop-in. Check website for rates.

<a href="#top">back to top</a>

<a id="ballet" name="ballet"></a><a id="marley" name="marley"></a>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>BALLET</strong></span>

&nbsp;

<strong>** see alternate summer schedule ** Back to the Marley <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#marcus" target="_blank">(Marcus Schulkind)</a></strong>

A connective tissue placement class utilizing Marcus' 47 years of movement principles, to align and revitalize the fascia and muscles, utilizing meridian energies and muscular skeletal exercises. All levels.

Fridays 8:30-9:30am, Saturday &amp; Sunday 10-11am  Ongoing - $15/drop-in
<a id="balletmarcus" name="balletmarcus"></a>
<strong>** see alternate summer schedule** Intermediate/Advanced Ballet <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#marcus" target="_blank">(Marcus Schulkind)</a></strong>

First hour: traditional ballet barre stressing placement, line, musicality, and groundedness. Second hour: adagio, turning phrases, petite allegro, And grand allegro. Live music.
<a id="balletdean" name="balletdean"></a>
Saturdays &amp; Sundays 11am-1pm  Ongoing - $12/barre $17.50/full class

&nbsp;

<strong>Intermediate/Advanced Ballet <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#dean" target="_blank">(Dean Vollick)</a></strong>

An intermediate/advanced ballet class comprised of barre, centre and traveling exercises that are designed to fine tune balance, coordination, and musicality. A challenging class to help any dancer stay in shape, or to prepare for a day of rehearsals. Live music!
<a id="improv" name="improv"></a>
Wednesdays 10-11:30am <strong> Resumes Aug 15th</strong> - $15/drop-in
<a id="improvolivier" name="improvolivier"></a>
<a href="#top">back to top</a>

<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>MOVEMENT TRAINING &amp; IMPROVISATION</strong></span>

&nbsp;

<strong>Contact Improvisation: Skills for Dancers &amp; Choreographers<a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#olivier" target="_blank">(Olivier Besson)</a> NEW!</strong>

This class is for dancers and choreographers who want to use contact improvisation to develop and enhance their understanding of partnering. Contact Improvisation (CI) started as a means to explore the physical forces imposed on the body by gravity and by the physics of momentum. In this class, we will work with sensations and images to generate patterns of movement through direct action (roll, slide, spiral, rise, fall, counterbalance, support, lift, loft and catch). Areas of exploration will include establishing a relationship to ground, developing an internal sense of movement, following points of contact, expanding spatial awareness and integrating leading and following skills in partnering.

Tuesdays7:30-9PM / May15th through June 19th

Six week session/$75
<a id="improvliz" name="improvliz"></a>
Drop in/$15

&nbsp;

<strong>Movement Improvisation <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#liz" target="_blank">(Liz Roncka)</a>NEW!</strong>

This class is open to everyone and anyone interested in increasing his or her creativity, awareness, sensitivity and responsivity to the environment. We approach improvisation as a performance form and cultivate our skills in movement invention and instant composition. However, we remain conscious that all of life is an improvisation. The skills we build in class are applicable to all parts of our lives... inside and outside of the studio. Come explore.

Thursdays 7:30-9:00pm - Ongoing - $15/drop-in
<a id="jazz" name="jazz"></a><a id="modjazz" name="modjazz"></a>

&nbsp;

<strong></strong>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>JAZZ &amp; HIP HOP</strong></span>

<strong>
</strong>

<strong>Int. Modern/Jazz <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#andy" target="_blank">(Andy Taylor-Blenis)</a></strong>

Intermediate modern jazz focuses on body alignment, core strength-building and an expanding dance vocabulary using a variety of modern and Jazz styles and techniques.
<a id="hiphop" name="hiphop"></a>
Wednesdays 7:30-9:30pm  Ongoing - $15/drop-in

&nbsp;

<strong>Hip Hop <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#tarikh" target="_blank">(Tarikh Campbell)</a></strong>

Prior dance experience is encouraged, but not required! This advanced hip hop class focuses on executing movements with precision, directing power to different parts of the body, and channeling the attitude of the music. Main styles are swagger, romance, and isolation. Be ready to sweat!

Saturdays 4:00-5:00pm  Ongoing - $5/drop-in; email <a href="mailto:tcamp09@alum.mit.edu" target="_blank">tcamp09@alum.mit.edu</a>

<a href="#top">back to top</a><a id="childrens" name="childrens"></a>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>CHILDRENS DANCE</strong></span>

&nbsp;

<strong>Creative Dance <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#katie" target="_blank">(Katie Dealy)</a></strong>

Children's classes combine strong technical skills with a nurturing creative environment. Classes engage imagination, employ props, storytelling and elementary technique. Register (617)-323-6376.

Wednesdays 2:45-3:45pm, Ages 2-4  Pre-registration Required, please call. Classes End from June 27th- Aug 8th

Tuesday 11:45- 12.15 Begins June 26th-Augest 7th (no class July 3rd) - Pre-registration Required, please call.
<a id="groovy" name="groovy"></a>
<strong>Music Together (<a href="http://groovybabymusic.com/" target="_blank">Groovy Baby Music</a>)</strong>

Music &amp; movement classes for children newborn to age 5 and their parents. Sing, dance, play instruments, &amp; learn about your child's music development. Our teachers are experienced educators and professional musicians. CDs, Songbook, and Parent Guide included.

Wednesdays 9-12am  July 11th- Aug 15th Pre-registration Required - Register at <a href="http://groovybabymusic.com" target="_blank">groovybabymusic.com</a>

<strong>Rhythm Kids</strong> (Groovy Baby Music)

Drum like an animal (ages 3-5)

Thursdays May 3rd-June 28th 9:00am, 10:00am - Register at <a href="http://www.rhythmkids.com/">http://www.rhythmkids.com</a>

<a href="#top">back to top</a>
<a id="salsa" name="salsa"></a>
<a id="latin" name="latin"></a>

<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>LATIN DANCE</strong></span>

<strong>Salsa: Beginning/Intermediate <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#matei" target="_blank">(Matei Livianu)</a></strong>

Master the fundamentals of Salsa while learning combinations and footwork in a fun environment. Focus on the basic steps and technique including essential rhythm, leading/following, isolation, and more. Adv.Beginning &amp; Intermediate Series:

Preregistration Required Email <a href="mailto:salsamatei@gmail.com" target="_blank">info@salsamatei.com</a> for info.

Advanced Beginner Salsa (Level 2) - 7:30-8:30pm $14/drop in
June 12th- July 10th

Intermediate Salsa (Level 3) - 8:30-9:30pm $14/drop in
June 12t-July 10th

<strong>**summer break until Sept**</strong>
<a id="traditional" name="traditional"></a>
<a id="balkan" name="balkan"></a>
<span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>TRADITIONAL DANCE/ECLECTIC</strong></span>

<strong>Caribbean Movement (All levels)</strong>

This class is open to those interested in exploring Caribbean beats and creative movement that celebrates the spirit. Experience a fusion of Reggaeton, Salsa, Bachata, Mergengue and Bellydance to create awareness in the body while opening the hips and exploring weight and movement to a dynamic soundtrack from Puerto Rico and neighboring islands. This class consists of a warm-up, isolations, and encourages exploration in movement while incorporating technical aspects such as popping and hip-shakes.

No prior experience necessary. Email: <a href="mailto:cassandra.fradera@gmail.com">cassandra.fradera@gmail.com</a> with any question you may have.

Fridays 6:30-7:30 - Drop/in: $10.00

Class runs from July 6<sup>th</sup> to August 24<sup>th</sup>
<strong>Cap0eira (Mestre Chuvisco)</strong>

Capoeira is an Afro-Brazilian art form that combines elments of dance, martial arts, music and acrobatics into a fluid game between two players. Training capoeira helps develop stamina, flexibility, strength and self-awareness.

Mestre Chuvisco has been teaching capoeira in and around Boston for over 10 years and has been training for over 30. All ages and levels of experience are welcome.Come visit us and learn more about this amazing art form.

Tuesday 7:30-8:30 July 3rd- Aug 28th Contact <a href="mailto:jason_ri@alum.colby.edu">jason_ri@alum.colby.edu</a> for information.

<strong>Balkan Dance <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#peter" target="_blank">(Peter Petrov)</a></strong>

Students will learn traditional dances from the Balkans. Lovely and energetic dances in ancient and modern styles. All levels welcome. For info call (617) 840-2362
<a id="belly" name="belly"></a>
Mondays 6:30  9pm  Ongoing

&nbsp;

<strong>Middle Eastern Dance &amp; BellyDance <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#najmat" target="_blank">(Najmat)</a></strong>

Tuesdays 6-7:30pm Pre-Registration Required - Call (617) 775-9898 to register

&nbsp;

<strong>Hawaiian Dance <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/teachers-artists-in-residence/#marta" target="_blank">(Marta Moussa)</a></strong>

This is an intermediate level class in which students work on hula technique &amp; repertoire. A variety of traditional and 'auana(modern) hulas are taught. For information on beginner classes email <a href="mailto:polynesiandancearts@yahoo.com" target="_blank">polynesiandancearts@yahoo.com</a>.

Wednesdays 6-7:30pm - Pre-registration Required  Call (781)721-1080 to register.

<a href="#top">back to top</a>

<strong>Beginning Hula</strong> (Marta Moussa)

In this beginner level series , students will learn basic hula movements and terminology, utilizing these movements in learning a beginning level hula. In keeping with hula's story telling nature, the meaning of the song will be explained.
Class attire: capris, shorts, leggings, or pareo(sarong-3 yds cotton fabric or pa'u (traditional hula skirt-nice but not necessary). We will dance in bare feet. NO long pants, long skirts, or baggy outfits.

Wednesdays 7:30-8:30pm studio 2 ---- Fee: $72.00 for 6 week series. July 11- Aug 15th

Pre-registration is required. Contact Marta for information to register for the series.
polynesiandancearts@yahoo.com

<a id="tap" name="tap"></a>
<strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>TAP, IRISH DANCE, FLAMENCO</strong></span></strong>

Visit our neighbors<strong><a title="Boston Percussive Dance" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/boston-percussive-dance/" target="_blank">Boston Percussive Dance</a>
</strong>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Press Page</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/about-us/press-page/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 02 Mar 2012 03:49:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>callie</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=1400</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[&nbsp;

Contact: Mariela Cerda                                                     FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

Cell phone: 617-955-7308

email: <a href="mailto:mariela.cerda@gmail.com" target="_blank">mariela.cerda@gmail.com</a>

&nbsp;

&nbsp;
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>   GREEN STREET STUDIOS 20 YEAR ANNIVERSARY</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong></strong><strong>     Gala Fundraising</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><em>"20 years of work, 20+ types of dance,</em><em>200+ artists, 2,000+ performances, $20,000 to keep this alive"</em></p>
&nbsp;

&nbsp;

Green Street Studios is celebrating its 20 year anniversary with an unique and unforgettable Gala on Saturday, May 12th, 8pm, at 185 Green St., Cambridge, MA 02139.

An amazing list of important choreographers and dancers will be performing such as David Dorfman, Sean Curran Dancers,David Parker /The Bang Group,Marcus Schulkind,Lorraine Chapman The Company, Sean Fielder/Boston Tap Company, Nicole Pierce/EgoArt, Inc.,Contrapose, Gianni Di Marco &amp; Adriana Surez, and Josh Hilberman.

In honor of its 20 years, there will be a special tribute to Green Street Studios founders: Marcus Schulkind, Cheri Opperman, Ruth Birnberg, Paula Josa-Jones and Pam White. The Gala will conclude with a reception and a party with additional small format performances.

Tickets are $100 (Special Guest), $50 (Gala and Reception), and $25 (Gala).

In conjunction with this historical Gala, an online Fundraiser was launched on March, where people can donate to support Green Street Studios and in this way help one of most important and iconic dance venues on the East Coast.

For reservations, donations, and additional information see:http://greenstreetstudios.org/performances-events/2012-gala/

For up dates in the press page see:http://greenstreetstudios.org/about-us/press-page/

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

If you would like more information about this event contact: Mariela Cerda at 617-955-7308 or <a href="mailto:mariela.cerda@gmail.com" target="_blank">mariela.cerda@gmail.com</a>

If you would like to schedule an interview with the artists, please contact:Green Street Studios at<a href="tel:617-864-3191">617-864-3191</a>or<a href="mailto:info@greenstreetstudios.org" target="_blank">info@greenstreetstudios.org</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>press-page</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>47</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>page</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>

	<item>
		<title>2012 Gala</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/performances-events/2012-gala/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 02 Mar 2012 04:12:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>callie</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=1409</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<script type="text/javascript">// <![CDATA[
function MM_preloadImages() { //v3.0
  var d=document; if(d.images){ if(!d.MM_p) d.MM_p=new Array();
    var i,j=d.MM_p.length,a=MM_preloadImages.arguments; for(i=0; i<a.length; i++)     if (a[i].indexOf("#")!=0){ d.MM_p[j]=new Image; d.MM_p[j++].src=a[i];}} } /
// ]]></script>

&nbsp;
<table width="671" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center">
<tbody>
<tr>
<td id="outertable" width="671" height="474"></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td id="outertable-bottom" style="text-align: center;" height="474">
<p class="gala-text"><a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=53"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1590" title="info" src="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/info.jpg" alt="" width="672" height="125" /></a></p>
<p class="gala-text"><a href="#performance"><img class="image-noborder" src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/titles_01.jpg" alt="performances" width="186" height="36" border="0" /></a><a href="#donations"><img class="image-noborder" src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/titles_02.jpg" alt="donations" width="191" height="36" align="none" border="0" /></a><a href="#merchandise"><img class="image-noborder" src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/titles_03.jpg" alt="merchandise" width="177" height="36" border="0" /></a></p>
<p class="gala-text"><strong>Green Street Studios is celebrating its 20 year anniversary</strong></p>
<p class="gala-text"><strong>with an unforgettable Gala.</strong></p>
<p class="gala-text"><strong> Don't miss it!</strong></p>
<p class="gala-text-left"><a id="performances" name="performances"></a><img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/headings_01.jpg" alt="performance" width="160" height="36" /></p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">David Dorfman</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Sean Curran and Dancers</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Lorraine Chapman The Company</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Sean Fielder/Boston Tap Company</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">David Parker/The Bang Group</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Nicole Pierce/EgoArt, Inc.</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Marcus Schulkind (performed by Lindsey Ridgeway)</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Contrapose Dance</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Gianni Di Marco and Adriana Surez</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Josh Hilberman</p>
<p class="gala-text-left"><img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/honoring.jpg" alt="honoring" width="250" height="36" /></p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Marcus Schulkind</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Cheri Opperman</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Ruth Birnberg</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Paula Josa-Jones</p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight">Pam White</p>
<p class="gala-text-left"><img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/prices.jpg" alt="prices" width="100" height="36" /></p>
<p class="gala-text-highlight"><strong>$100 Special Guest:</strong></p>

<ul>
	<li><span class="gala-text-left">1 Ticket for the show with a preferential seat.</span></li>
	<li><span class="gala-text-left"> 1 Ticket for the Reception with a seat at the Honoring Founders table.</span></li>
	<li><span class="gala-text-left"> 1 Special guest Souvenir bag (DVD about Green Street Studios and Liza Voll's thank you note picture)</span>.</li>
</ul>
<p class="gala-text-highlight"><strong>$50 Gala and Reception</strong>:</p>

<ul>
	<li class="gala-text-left">1 Ticket for the show.</li>
	<li class="gala-text-left">1 Ticket for the Reception.</li>
</ul>
<em>New level.</em> <strong>$30reception and after-party:</strong>
<ul>
	<li>1 Ticket for the Reception.</li>
</ul>
<p class="gala-text-left"><strong class="gala-text-highlight">$25 Gala:</strong> (available for purchase only on May 12)</p>

<ul>
	<li class="gala-text-left">1 Ticket for the show.</li>
</ul>
<p class="gala-text">(please register <a href="#below">below</a>)</p>
<p class="gala-text"><a id="donations" name="donations"></a>
<img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/purpleline.jpg" alt="purple line" width="571" height="3" /></p>

<form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post"><input type="hidden" name="cmd" value="_s-xclick" /> <input type="hidden" name="hosted_button_id" value="SL4LXPXDZB69U" /></form><form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post"><input type="image" name="submit2" src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/headings_02.jpg" alt="PayPal - The safer, easier way to pay online!" align="left" /> <img src="https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/scr/pixel.gif" alt="" width="1" height="1" border="0" /></form>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;"></p>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;"></p>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;">Whether you are planning on attending the gala performances,</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">are out of town or would like to show your support,</p>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;">please consider donating even a small amount to Green Street Studios.</p>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;">Remember, every little bit helps.</p>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;" align="center">[donation-can goal_id='gss-' style_id='gss-gala' show_progress=true show_description=false show_donations=false show_title=false title='']</p>
<p class="gala-text-left" style="text-align: left;" align="center"><em>Donation is tax deductible. This is for a straight donation only.</em></p>
<p style="text-align: left;">If you purchase a Gala ticket only a portion of your purchase is tax deductible.</p>
&nbsp;

<p class="gala-text"><img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/tealine.jpg" alt="teline" width="571" height="3" /><a id="merchandise" name="merchandise"></a></p>
<p class="gala-text-left"><img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/headings_03.jpg" alt="merchandise" width="151" height="35" /></p>

		<title>Classes</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Mar 2012 00:39:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>callie</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=1556</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<strong>NEW Classes added!</strong> <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/class-descriptions/#improvliz" target="_blank">Movement Improvisation with Liz Roncka</a>(starts April 14th) &amp; <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/class-descriptions/#improvolivier" target="_blank">Contact Improvisation with Olivier Besson</a> (starts May 15th).

&nbsp;

** Please <a title="Summer Schedule" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/summer-schedule/" target="_blank">click here</a> for important information on our spring/summer schedule including substitutes for Marcus Schulkind and NEW classes.

<strong>Classes 7 days a week</strong>

<strong></strong>
<a href="#schedule" target="_top">Please visit our LIVE schedule below for class changes &amp; cancellations</a>

[caption id="" align="alignright" width="300" caption="Photo by Liza Voll Photography"]<img class=" " title="LizaVollPhotography-6899" src="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/LizaVollPhotography-68991-300x200.jpg" alt="" width="300" height="200" />[/caption]

NEW<a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/GSS-Schedule-Spring-and-Summer-2012.pdf" target="_blank">Spring/Summer Schedule</a>

<a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=820" target="_blank">Class Descriptions</a>

<a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=174" target="_blank">Teachers &amp; Artists in Residence</a>
<a title="Boston Percussive Dance" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/boston-percussive-dance/" target="_blank">Boston Percussive Dance</a>

<strong>UPCOMING IMPROVISATION WORKSHOP!</strong>

With Olivier Besson SATURDAY 10:30AM-1PM

June 2nd / floor work and low flying

June 9th / rise, fall and counterbalance

Both/$40

Drop in/$22
Feel free to call or email us with questions at 617-864-3191 or email <a href="mailto:info@greenstreetstudios.org" target="_blank">info@greenstreetstudios.org</a>.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>2012 GSS Gala - May 12</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/2012-gss-gala-may-12/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 05 Apr 2012 05:45:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>callie</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?p=1584</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/square-for-sharing.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-1585" title="square-for-sharing" src="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/square-for-sharing.jpg" alt="" width="600" height="568" /></a></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>Green Street Studios is celebrating its 20 year anniversary</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong>with an unforgettable Gala.</strong></p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><strong> Don't miss it!</strong></p>
<a id="performances" name="performances"></a><img class="aligncenter" src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/headings_01.jpg" alt="performance" width="160" height="36" />
<p style="text-align: center;">David Dorfman</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Sean Curran and Dancers</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Lorraine Chapman The Company</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Sean Fielder/Boston Tap Company</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">David Parker/The Bang Group</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Nicole Pierce/EgoArt, Inc.</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Marcus Schulkind (performed by Lindsey Ridgeway)</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Contrapose Dance</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Gianni Di Marco and Adriana Surez</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Josh Hilberman</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><img src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/honoring.jpg" alt="honoring" width="250" height="36" /></p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Marcus Schulkind</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Cheri Opperman</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Ruth Birnberg</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Paula Josa-Jones</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">Pam White</p>
<img class="alignnone" src="http://www.greenstreetstudios.org/2012gala/images/prices.jpg" alt="prices" width="100" height="36" />

<strong>$100 Special Guest:</strong>
<ul>
	<li>1 Ticket for the show with a preferential seat.</li>
	<li>1 Ticket for the Reception with a seat at the Honoring Founders table.</li>
	<li>1 Special guest Souvenir bag (DVD about Green Street Studios and Liza Voll's thank you note picture).</li>
</ul>
<strong>$50 Gala and Reception</strong>:
<ul>
	<li>1 Ticket for the show.</li>
	<li>1 Ticket for the Reception.</li>
</ul>
<em>New level.</em> <strong>$30reception and after-party:</strong>
<ul>
	<li>1 Ticket for the Reception.</li>
</ul>
<strong>$25 Gala:</strong> (available for purchase only on May 12)
<ul>
	<li>1 Ticket for the show.</li>
</ul>
<p style="text-align: left;">(please register <a href="../performances-events/2012-gala/#below">HERE</a>)</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">For more information, please visit out <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/performances-events/2012-gala/">GALA PAGE</a></p>]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:post_id>1584</wp:post_id>

		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Boston Percussive Dance</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/boston-percussive-dance/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 15 Apr 2012 17:15:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>greenstreetstudios</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=1734</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Green Street Studios is proud to be the home of <a href="http://www.bostonpercussivedance.com" target="_blank">Boston Percussive Dance</a>!

&nbsp;

Founded by tap dancer<a title="http://www.juliaontap.com/" href="http://www.juliaontap.com/" target="_blank">Julia Boynton</a>and Irish step dancer<a title="http://www.KieranJordan.com/" href="http://www.kieranjordan.com/" target="_blank">Kieran Jordan</a>, this new studio has been created as a home base for tap, Irish step, and other forms of percussive dance. Our studio features a new floor from Wooden Kiwi Productions, made of Rosco sprung panels, and a non-slip Duron surface that produces crisp clear sound. Come try it out!The studio is available for classes, workshops, rehearsals and events.For rentals or other information, contact<a title="mailto:jb@juliaontap.com?subject=studio rental" href="mailto:jb@juliaontap.com?subject=studio%20rental" target="_blank">Julia</a>or<a title="mailto:kieranjordandancers@gmail.com?subject=studio rental" href="mailto:kieranjordandancers@gmail.com?subject=studio%20rental" target="_blank">Kieran</a>.

&nbsp;

Boston Percussive Dance is located at 185 Green Street in Central Square, Cambridge  the heart of the Boston dance community. Our space is inside Green Street Studios (Studio #3). Visit our website at<a title="http://www.bostonpercussivedance.com" href="http://www.bostonpercussivedance.com/" target="_blank">www.bostonpercussivedance.com</a>
<br/>
[caption id="attachment_1732" align="aligncenter" width="717" caption="Boston Percussive Dance                                                                                            Photo by Liz Voll Photography"]<img class=" wp-image-1732 " title="Studio3_Panorama Liza Voll" src="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/Studio3_Panorama-Liza-Voll-1024x306.jpg" alt="" width="717" height="214" />[/caption] ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>After the Gala: Reception and after-party!!!!!!</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/after-the-gala-reception-and-after-party/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 05 May 2012 13:41:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>mariela</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?p=2015</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div>Following the formal reception, Boston Percussive Dance will host an after-party in studio 3, with DJ music, impromptu percussive dance performances, live Irish music, and more. Come dance, mingle, and unwind!</div>
<div></div>
<div>The after-party is included in the $50 and $100 tickets. Separate $30 tickets for the party will be available online and at the door on Saturday, May 12th.</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2015</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2012-05-05 13:41:00</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2012-05-05 13:41:00</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>after-the-gala-reception-and-after-party</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Dear Friends and Members of Green Street Studios:</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/performances-events/2012-gala/dear-friends-and-members-of-green-street-studios/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 09 May 2012 04:36:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>callie</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=2057</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div style="padding-left: 30px;">
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Our 20th Anniversary Gala to be held on Saturday, May 12th is fast approaching! Wed like to take this opportunity to share our excitement in this landmark celebration and the importance of the associated fundraising campaign to Green Streets continued success.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">For 20 years, Green Street Studios has been a laboratory for dance in the Boston area. Founded originally by five choreographers who needed space for their creative dance work, Green Street has evolved as a dance and movement arts center that is now home to hundreds of dancers who rehearse and study, and over 20 teachers in a range of disciplines.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">What makes Green Street so special is that it provides students of ALL ages and skill levels, and the wider public, the opportunity to experience the beauty and traditions of diverse dance forms in an intimate and friendly creative environment.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 60px;">Our Anniversary Gala is a joyous celebration of our:
<strong>20 years of work</strong>
<strong> 20+ types of dance</strong>
<strong> 200+ artists</strong>
<strong> 2,000+ performances</strong></p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">We want Green Street Studios to serve the creative Boston dance community for another 20 years, but we need your help to make this a reality. Thats why we have launched a fundraising campaign to raise $20,000.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">In recent years, our operating costs such as monthly rent have risen substantially while some needed improvements have been deferred. At the same time, we have resisted raising rental fees for teachers, artists, and choreographers in our efforts to continually provide high quality, affordable space. Memberships, donations, and rental income have not kept pace with rising costs, resulting in a funding shortfall.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">The $20,000 will support Green Street's maintenance and improvements, as well as provide a cushion toward our expected rental increase this summer. We are also developing a more sustainable business model and are looking for new facility users, Green Street sponsors and supporters. Any suggestions you have in this regard would be welcomed.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Please join us in supporting the<strong> continued success of Green Street Studios</strong>. You can do so by purchasing tickets to the May 12th gala, which promises to be a beautiful and memorable night. If you can't attend the performance, or even if you can, please consider a donation...$20, $50, or any other amount you can give. There is a simple online donation page, and your gift is tax deductible.</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">We are grateful for your support of Green Street Studios and we look forward to celebrating dance with you on May 12th and beyond!</p>
<p style="padding-left: 30px;">Best Wishes,
Green Street Studios Board of Directors</p>

</div>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2057</wp:post_id>

		<wp:comment_status>closed</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>dear-friends-and-members-of-green-street-studios</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>1409</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

	<item>
		<title>Summer Schedule</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/summer-schedule/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 27 May 2012 16:10:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>greenstreetstudios</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?page_id=2099</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[View our new<a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/pub?key=0AhfikJpJj0uVdGtmNnpjQV9Gb05rN2k5Z01LY1dFcnc&amp;single=true&amp;gid=0&amp;output=html" target="_blank">GSS Schedule Spring and Summer 2012</a>

May, 2012

Dear Students:

As some of you may know, starting 5/21 Marcus Schulkind will not be teaching due to his recovery from knee surgery. The exact date of his return will be determined, however we anticipate he will be out all of May, June, &amp; July (and possibly some of August). During this time we have a fantastic roster of artists teaching in his place (see details below). We are working hard to bring you a great group of teachers, so please check back for more updates throughout the summer. Please feel free to email us with questions on who is teaching and when at <a href="mailto:info@greenstreetstudios.org">info@greenstreetstudios.org</a>. Thanks!

Sincerely,
Green Street Studios<strong><strong></strong></strong>

<strong>SUBSTITUTIONS FOR MARCUS CLASSES:</strong>

The weekend of May 25, 26, 27: All Classes with Marcus Schulkind are CANCELED
Fri, June 1: Back to the Marley &amp; Modern CANCELED
Sat, June 2: Olivier Besson Contact Improvisation Workshop 10:30-1pm in place of classes
Sun, June 3: Rosann Ridings starts session: Ballet 11-12:45pm
(see below)
Fri, June 8: Nicole Pierce starts session: Modern 9:30-11:30am
(see below)
Sat, June 9: Olivier Besson Contact Improvisation Workshop 10:30-1pm in place of classes
Friday, June 15: Gyrokinesis with Lisa Pari starts session 8:30-9:30am (see below)

<strong><strong>
FRIDAYS:
Int/Adv Modern with Nicole Pierce 9:30-11:30am
</strong></strong>6 Weeks June 8, 15, 22, 29, July 6 and 13.
Pay-up-front price of $90.00 ($15/class) or $17 for drop-ins. $10 student rate.<strong><strong></strong></strong>

Gyrokenisis with Lisa Pari 8:30-9:30 am
Starts June 15
more info coming soon<strong><strong></strong></strong>

<strong>SATURDAYS:</strong>
<strong>Back to the Marley 10-11am TBA</strong>

<strong>June 2nd &amp; 9th: Olivier Besson Contact Improvisation Workshop</strong>
10:30-1pm in place of classes
June 2nd / floor work and low flying
June 9th / rise, fall and counterbalance
Both/$45
Drop in/$25<strong><strong></strong></strong>

Olivier Besson is an improviser, choreographer and teacher who hails from France and is based in Boston. He has studied contact improvisation with Robin Feld, Nancy Stark Smith, Lisa Nelson and Andrew Harwood. Oliviers work has been presented in Japan, Russia, France, Taiwan and the US. He is currently teaching improvisation and contact improvisation at The Boston Conservatory and has been on faculty at Canal Danse (Paris), the French National Circus School, Bates Dance Festival, Emerson College and the School of Fine Arts at Boston University.
<strong><strong>
</strong></strong>

<strong>July 21 &amp; 28: David Leventhal of the Mark Morris Dance Group. more info coming soon</strong>

<strong>SUNDAYS:</strong>
<strong>Back to the Marley 10-11am TBA</strong>

<strong>BALLET taught by Rosann Ridings: 11:00-12:45pm</strong>
Starts June 3rd through July 22nd
$16 drop-ins

Under the artistic direction of E. Virginia Williams, Ms. Ridings became a member of the Boston Ballet Company. She later danced with the Copley Square Ballet and has performed as a guest artist throughout New England. her teaching experience includes: Ballet Theatre of Boston, Classical Ballet of Boston, Dean Junior College and the prestigious Chautaugua Institution in New York. She is a former director of the Cambridge Ballet Center and is currently teaching at the Dance Complex in Cambridge, Mass, and the Lexington School of Ballet, Ballet New England, Donna Cocos Performance Plus, as well as judging several national dance competitions.<strong><strong></strong></strong>

* We will post more information/classes as we go. Check back often and feel free to email us at <a href="mailto:info@greenstreetstudios.org">info@greenstreetstudios.org</a> for any questions about who is teaching!

* Please visit our <a title="Classes" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/" target="_blank">LIVE Schedule </a>for an up-to-date listing of Marcus classes as well as NEW spring/summer classes including:

<strong><strong>NEW CLASSES!!!</strong></strong>

<strong><strong>Advanced Beginning Modern taught by Jimena Bermejo Black
</strong></strong>(substitute for Jody Weber)
Mondays 7:30-9:00pm
4 weeks only: June 4th - June 25th
More info coming soon.<strong><strong></strong></strong>

<strong>CONTACT IMPROVISATION:</strong>
<strong> SKILLS FOR DANCERS AND CHOREOGRAPHERS</strong>
taught by Olivier Besson
TUESDAYS 7:30-9PM / May15th through June 19th
Six week session/$75
Drop in/$15
<strong><strong>
This class is for dancers and choreographers who want to use contact improvisation to develop and enhance their understanding of partnering. Contact Improvisation (CI) started as a means to explore the physical forces imposed on the body by gravity and by the physics of momentum. In this class, we will work with sensations and images to generate patterns of movement through direct action (roll, slide, spiral, rise, fall, counterbalance, support, lift, loft and catch). Areas of exploration will include establishing a relationship to ground, developing an internal sense of movement, following points of contact, expanding spatial awareness and integrating leading and following skills in partnering.</strong></strong>

<strong>Intermediate /Advanced modern technique with Cheri Opperman</strong>
Wednesdays 6:00-7:30 pm
(substitute for Jody Weber)<strong><strong></strong></strong>

Beginning June 6th through August 1st for 8 weeks only
Live musical accompaniment provided by the incomparable Jerry Bussiere
Class fees: 8 weeks only- register for the entire session for $120.00
Single class/drop in for $17.
Questions? Email Cheri at cheriop@rcn.com

Cheri Opperman is a Founding Director of Green Street Studios in Cambridge. Cheri has been performing, teaching and choreographing professionally for more than 30 years since receiving her BFA in Dance from the Boston Conservatory. As a member of Susan Roses DanceWorks she taught and performed extensively throughout New York and New England and guest taught at the Festival dArles, France. At DanceWorks studio she taught elementary through advanced level of modern technique and repertory. As a member of Concert Dance Company she performed in the works of Merce Cunningham, Mark Morris, Kei Ta Kei, Laura Dean, Lucinda Childs, Bebe Miller, Deborah Wolfe, Mark Dendy and many others, and taught company repertory and master classes on tour including the Colorado Dance Festival. Cheri taught at CDC's School for Contemporary Dance modern and ballet technique, stretch and alignment and company repertory. Her work has been performed at Green Street Studios, Dance Complex and Emerson Stage. Cheri has been on the dance faculty of Emerson College and recently Harvard University. Cheri is Grants Coordinator for the National Dance Project, a program administered through the New England Foundation for the Arts. Cheris teaching style focuses on breath, imagery, dynamic alignment and the pleasure of moving through space. She has a long association with musician Jerry Bussiere, who accompanies classes with live music.
<strong><strong>
</strong></strong>
<p dir="ltr"><strong>Movement Improvisation taught by Liz Roncka</strong></p>
<p dir="ltr">Thursdays 7:30-9:00pm  Ongoing  $15/drop-in</p>
<p dir="ltr">This class is open to everyone and anyone interested in increasing his or her creativity, awareness, sensitivity and responsivity to the environment. We approach improvisation as a performance form and cultivate our skills in movement invention and instant composition. However, we remain conscious that all of life is an improvisation. The skills we build in class are applicable to all parts of our lives inside and outside of the studio. Come explore.</p>
<strong id="internal-source-marker_0.004746910883113742">
* Please visit our <a title="Classes" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/" target="_blank">LIVE Schedule</a> for updates!</strong>

* Feel free to email us at <a href="mailto:info@greenstreetstudios.org">info@greenstreetstudios.org</a> for any questions about classes &amp; teachers!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Thank You</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/2080/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 14 May 2012 18:16:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>greenstreetstudios</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?p=2080</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Thank you to everyone who came out to support our 20th Anniversary Gala; a fantastic audience, crew, and group of performers all made for a sensational evening. Many thanks to all our friends who made the evening possible: the fabulous Jayne Murphy and tech crew, GSS Board and staff, Gala Coordinator Mariela Cerda, MC Nicole Pierce, Jimena Bermejo Black, William Parsons, Kieran Jordan &amp; Julia Boynton and all of Boston Percussive Dance, our dedicated volunteers, the GSS founders, and finally, the talented choreographers and performers whose brilliance and generosity made the show shine.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2080</wp:post_id>

	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Read our Gala review in the Boston Globe &amp; check out the party photos!</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/read-our-gala-review-in-the-boston-globe-check-out-the-party-photos/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 24 May 2012 16:15:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>greenstreetstudios</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?p=2087</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Read the review of our 20th Anniversary Gala in the Boston Globe! "Saturday nights gala performance showcased not just the range but the technical prowess and emotional resonance of that work. The 10 dances by nine choreographers swung in tone from understated wit to thumping drama, lickety-split tapping to lush falls and recovery. Uniting them all were brio and heart." - Thea Singer

<a href="http://b.globe.com/MopYbl" rel="nofollow nofollow" target="_blank">http://b.globe.com/MopYbl</a>

&nbsp;

PLUS! Scroll through the after party photos featured in the Globe! <a href="http://www.boston.com/lifestyle/specials/bill_brett/may2012?pg=11" rel="nofollow nofollow" target="_blank">http://www.boston.com/lifestyle/specials/bill_brett/may2012?pg=11</a>]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Our <a href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/wp-content/uploads/2012/03/GSS-Schedule-Spring-and-Summer-2012.pdf" target="_blank">Spring/Summer Schedule</a>is here!

*** Please read our important<a title="Summer Schedule" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/classes-2/summer-schedule/" target="_blank">update</a> on Marcus Schulkind's summer classes and also read about our NEW summer classes including:

<strong>Advanced Beginning Modern taught by Jimena Bermejo Black</strong>
(substitute for Jody Weber)
Mondays 7:30-9:00pm
4 weeks only: June 4th - June 25th

<strong>CONTACT IMPROVISATION:</strong>
<strong>SKILLS FOR DANCERS AND CHOREOGRAPHERS</strong>
<strong>taught by Olivier Besson</strong>
TUESDAYS 7:30-9PM / May15th through June 19th

<strong>Intermediate /Advanced modern technique with Cheri Opperman</strong>
Wednesdays 6:00-7:30 pm
(substitute for Jody Weber)
Beginning June 6th through August 1st for 8 weeks only
<p dir="ltr"><strong>Movement Improvisation taught by Liz Roncka</strong> onThursdays 7:30-9:00pm  Ongoing  $15/drop-in</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>GREEN STREET STUDIOS 20 YEARS ANNIVERSARY RAFFLE</title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/green-street-studios-20-years-anniversary-raffle/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 11 Jun 2012 12:57:13 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>mariela</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?p=2205</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: left;" align="center"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">$10,000 worth in prizes give away!!!! $3 each . $10 for 4. It is really easy: ask your teacher about the raffle or go to the GSS office, choose a number in a list, write your contact info there, and good luck!!!!</span></strong></p>
<p style="text-align: left;" align="center"><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Winners on June 17<sup>th</sup>, at 6.30pm , 2012, during the Gala video showing at Green Street Studios.</span></strong></p>

<ol>
	<li>Bradford portrait gift card ($5,500 value).</li>
	<li>Middle East restaurant. Gift card dinner for 2.</li>
	<li>Green Street Studios t-shirt ($25 value).</li>
	<li>Green Street Gala poster. (10 separate prints, $10 value each).</li>
	<li>Liza Voll photography thanks notes package. (5 separate packages, $25 value each)</li>
	<li>Photowork by Larry Pratt. Title: Alien Dancers 7.5x10. ($150 value).</li>
	<li>Photowork by Larry Pratt. Title: Forest Fire 7.5x10. ($150 value).</li>
	<li>Photowork by Larry Pratt. Title: Learning to Move 16x16. ($500 value).</li>
	<li>Photowork by Larry Pratt. Title: Contrapose Dance: Ground 12x17. ($500 value).</li>
	<li>Books. Ballets Russes packet. (10 books about Nijinsky, Alicia Markova, Marie Rambert, Ballets-Russes, Diaghilev Ballet, among others).</li>
	<li>Books. Balanchine Packet. (6 books).</li>
	<li>Books. American concert dance packet. (9 books about Ruth St. Denis, Ted Shawn, Hanya Holm, among others).</li>
	<li>Books. American Folk Dance packet. (4 books about The Round Dance, The American Square Dance, among others).</li>
	<li>Books. Tap and Astaire books. (2 books about Fred Astaire).</li>
	<li>Books. Russian superstars books. (2 books about Nureyev and Baryshnikov).</li>
	<li>Books. Isadora. (2 books about Isadora Duncan).</li>
	<li>Books. Misc dance picture books. (3 books about Modern Ballet, The World Of Ballet and Dance, and Petrushka, Stories of the Ballet).</li>
	<li>Books. Oversize dance picture books. (4 books about Ballet Portraits, Dance Shoes, Diaghilev and the Ballets Russes, and The Story of the Dance)</li>
	<li>MISC ballet books. (3 books about The Nutcracker Ballet, Dance, and Ballet).</li>
</ol>
<strong>
</strong>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>GSS seeks Volunteers &amp; Work Study Students! </title>
		<link>http://greenstreetstudios.org/green-street-seeks-volunteers-and-work-study-students/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 15 Jun 2012 16:50:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>greenstreetstudios</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://greenstreetstudios.org/?p=2212</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Looking to get more involved and earn free classes? GSS is looking for enthusiastic, reliable work study students for the summer and beyond. Cleaning and office work in exchange for free classes and rehearsal space.

Want to get involved with shows? Ask us about our House Manager Program. Want to get started right away? Come to our video showing this Sunday and help set-up or break-down, we would love to meet you. Email info@greenstreetstudios.orgto let us know you want to get in more involved in your Green Street Community!

<a title="Get Involved" href="http://greenstreetstudios.org/get-involved/" target="_blank">Get Involved</a>

Thanks to all of our current volunteers! We couldn't do it without you!]]></content:encoded>
